item.title: Eurostar Faces Severe Delays After Power Failure
item.description: A power failure in the Channel Tunnel has paralyzed the Eurostar service, causing delays for thousands of holiday travelers between London, Paris and ...

item.title: Saudis Say Airstrike in Yemen Targeted Arms From U.A.E.
item.description: The Saudi-led coalition said a strike on a port in southern Yemen was targeting weapons bound for a separatist group that is backed by the United Arab...

item.title: How Russia and Ukraine Are Fighting to Shape President Trump’s View of the War
item.description: Off the battlefield, each side is trying to influence the American leader’s perception as they look to negotiate a peace settlement in their favor.

item.title: Overlooked Stories
item.description: We look at some of our best stories from 2025 that Times editors thought deserved more attention.

item.title: China Fires Rockets Near Taiwan in Display of Military Power
item.description: China’s military also sent warships and aircraft during a second day of exercises designed to show its ability to claim the democratic island.
